title: Resource Descriptor
description: Shared base schema for remote resource references. Used by memory, context, and extension files to describe external data sources that can be fetched or referenced.

type.description: The kind of remote resource being referenced.

path.description: Local filesystem path to the resource, relative to the .project directory.

auth.description: Authentication configuration for accessing the resource. Secrets are referenced via environment variable names, never stored inline.

token_env.description: Environment variable name containing the bearer or OAuth token.

key_env.description: Environment variable name containing the API key.

refresh.description: How frequently the resource content should be refreshed.

mime_type.description: MIME type of the resource content (e.g., application/yaml, image/png).
